Description: Plant that emits light and hides when enemies are nearby. To assign a light, place a light, customize it and then type it's name in "Target" keyvalue of this xen_plantlight. Also you can change "Classification" of this entity- plant only hides from enemies.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }}. Can't be triggered. Can be kill-targeted.
[Light](../light) entity to be used by this xen_plantlight.
